Aug. 22, 1896 D Brechin Contest
Brechin Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Brechin Contest brechin-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Brechin Public Park, Brechin, Angus, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Friday, August 12, 1898; pg. 6; Issue 14080. 6 bands competed Prizes: £25, £20, £15, £7, £3 Brechin and Arbroath were tied in placing. March contest: 1. Carriden, 2. Brechin, 3. Kirkcaldy
March 8, 2012, 4:37 p.m. July 1, 2019, 10:13 p.m.
1 Clydebank Burgh Band Richard Marsden Beethoven Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
2 Kirkcaldy Trades Richard Marsden Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
3 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Alexander Bell Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
4 Brechin City Richard Marsden Verdi [arr. Round]
4 Arbroath Instrumental Friend Farrand Meyerbeer's Works [unknown arranger]
6 Crossgates Richard Marsden Rossini [arr. Round]
Withdrawn Wright Memorial Unknown
